articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: 43-Year-Old Rohan Bopanna Becomes Oldest Indian Wells Champion - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India's Rohan Bopanna became the oldest ATP Masters 1000 champion when he and his Australian partner Matt Ebden claimed the men's doubles crown at the BNP Paribas Open
articles.content: India's Rohan Bopanna became the oldest ATP Masters 1000 champion when he and his Australian partner Matt Ebden claimed the men's doubles crown at the BNP Paribas Open. The 43-year-old Bopanna and Eb… [+1515 chars]
